summary: Logo display was added to Header.tsx and UnauthenticatedScreen.tsx using an /assets/Momentum.png path with object-contain styling, but the actual Momentum.png static asset was not added under frontend/public (no added files in diff), so the stable static-asset requirement is not met based on the provided diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the uploaded Momentum logo image (Momentum.png) to the frontend as a static asset under frontend/public (or subfolder like frontend/public/assets/...) so it can be served at a stable URL without backend fetch.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary shows no added files, so there is no evidence that Momentum.png (or any static asset under frontend/public/assets) was actually added. Header.tsx and UnauthenticatedScreen.tsx reference /assets/Momentum.png, but the asset itself is not present in the diff.

hallucinated_features.description: Responsive full/short date display added in the global header.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to add and display the Momentum logo in the header/login screen; it did not request changes to date formatting or responsive date behavior.

hallucinated_features.description: Unauthenticated/login page marketing feature list (Eisenhower Matrix, routines, earnings) and additional copy/styling changes beyond adding the logo.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-3 only specifies adding a large, centered, non-distorted logo above the login button with responsive layout; the additional feature bullets and expanded copy are not requested.
evidence: frontend/src/components/UnauthenticatedScreen.tsx (CheckCircle2 bullet list and extra descriptive text)
